description: List marketing pages with admin filters (drafts and deleted). Accepts optional filters (MarketingPageFilterInput) with includeDrafts (Boolean, default: false) and includeDeleted (Boolean, default: false). Returns MarketingPageList with pages array and total count. Role check via UserProfileRepository (must be Admin or SuperAdmin). Uses MarketingService.list_pages with filter options. Returns pages based on filter settings (drafts and/or deleted). Response structure is validated before conversion to GraphQL type.
